channel.title: Turmoil Rebirth - Reopened
channel.description:
I've decided to Reopen turmoil rebirth as ive settled down got my thoughts together with my job and college and now deciding to open it back up, lost all members that were playing as i closed this down over 4 months ago. Need new staff Need couple helping coders. No flaming my post as i just need a couple people to monitor so heres your application to follow. To check out the server follow this link, (please remember i have not modified this server in a very long time so if its outdated let me know, politely, and i will update it to the best i can. Thanks) http://www.turmoilrebirth.webs.com
[code]Age: Experience: Patience: (lot or little?) Do you give in to others? Do you fall to bribes easy? What could you help improve on the Server?[/code]

item.title: Turmoil Rebirth - Reopened
item.dc:creator: @Method Method_
item.description:
@Method wrote:

Age: 16
Experience: 1 Year in RSPS coding
Patience: (lot or little?) A lot.
Do you give in to others? No, if someone tries to make me mad I just ignore then or troll them back
Do you fall to bribes easy? Nope
What could you help improve on the Server? Well, since I was recently a Moderator of your server (I’m Techno), I could improve a lot of things and make it like it used to be.

Please pick me Kyle!

Read full topic

item.title: Turmoil Rebirth - Reopened
item.dc:creator: @kile_392 kile 392
item.description:
@kile_392 wrote:

Age:15
Experience:Lots
Patience: (lot or little?)medium
Do you give in to others?No
Do you fall to bribes easy?No
What could you help improve on the Server? By helping new players, helping test stuff, and moderate players.

Read full topic

item.title: Turmoil Rebirth - Reopened
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Read the rules. You are not allowed to post website links unless approved by a moderator.

Venge Drop:

Too much time put in pictures i dont really care to find good pics of my server if you would like to be part of it go check it out and decide. Thank you.

Also, I don’t think you will find many people wanting to join this unless you do show pictures. Or AT LEAST some information about the server.
It does not take that long.

Read full topic
